synopsis.text: The film centers on mysterious happenings in Sternbild City that occur on 'Justice Day', a festival celebrating the city's legendary goddess. When a new corporate leadership takes over Apollon Media, it breaks up the crime-fighting partnership between veteran hero Kotetsu T. Kaburagi (Wild Tiger) and rookie Barnaby Brooks Jr. While Kotetsu gets fired, Barnaby gets reassigned to pair up with a powerful yet arrogant new hero named Golden Ryan. Soon after, Tiger, Barnaby, and other heroes must investigate a series of strange incidents around the city resembling an ancient curse. Their investigation leads them to uncover three villainous NEXTs with superpowers who are plotting to spread chaos and destruction across Sternbild. Though no longer partners, Tiger and Barnaby may need to reunite in order to save their city from these sinister forces on its most important day.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
